This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL request() on non-fully-active document must fail promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'then')"
FAIL query() on a non-fully-active document must fail promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'then')"
FAIL request()'s fully-active check happens earlier than name validation promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'then')"
FAIL Reactivated iframe must not reuse the previous LockManager promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'then')"
PASS Workers owned by an unloaded iframe must release their locks
Harness: the test ran to completion.
